name: Interlink Electronics, Inc.
description: Interlink Electronics, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced touch technology solutions and innovative human-machine interface (HMI) products. Founded in 1985 and based in Camarillo, California, Interlink specializes in the development and manufacturing of innovative touch sensors, force-sensing resistors, and other electronic components that enhance user interaction with various devices. The company’s products are utilized across a wide range of industries, including medical devices, automotive, consumer electronics, and industrial controls. Interlink’s patented technology allows for precise touch and pressure detection, enabling users to interact with devices seamlessly. The company is committed to continuous innovation, working closely with clients to deliver customized solutions that meet specific market needs. With a focus on quality and performance, Interlink Electronics aims to improve the user experience in everyday technology while striving for sustainability in its manufacturing processes. The company is also actively engaged in research and development to expand its product offerings and maintain its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.

seo.meta_title: Interlink Electronics, Inc. | Advanced Touch Technology Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Interlink Electronics, Inc., a leader in touch technology and human-machine interface products. Discover innovative solutions for various industries.

faq.question: What does Interlink Electronics specialize in?
faq.answer: Interlink Electronics specializes in advanced touch technology solutions and innovative human-machine interface products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Interlink Electronics?
faq.answer: Mark W. H. Gibbons is the CEO of Interlink Electronics, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Interlink Electronics headquartered?
faq.answer: Interlink Electronics is headquartered in Camarillo, California, USA.

faq.question: What are some main products of Interlink Electronics?
faq.answer: Some main products include touch pads, touch screens, and pressure sensors.
